column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: The Department of Investigation and Procedure of the Department of Immigration on Friday morning
column6: deported 6 Chinese men from the country.------Lieutenant General Vathanak Mongkol
column7: director of the Investigation and Procedure Department
column8: said that all six Chinese nationals were expelled from the Kingdom
column9: according to the Ministry of Interior’s expulsion order dated October 28
column11: over telecommunications fraud scams (VOIP).------The operation also involves the competence of the Ministry of Public Security of the People’s Republic of China
column12: who will comply with the law in China.
